sentences.sContent: Contains a heraldic formula or phrase, typically found as part of a blazon , coat of arms, etc.
sentences.sContent_eng: Contains a heraldic formula or phrase, typically found as part of a blazon , coat of arms, etc.
sentences.sCn: 包含一个纹章学的常规或词汇，通常是装饰、或盾形纹章等的一部分。

remMethod.val: 在我的地盘 (zone) 广布我的言论 (blazon)

words.tran: 燃烧体；宣布者；颜色鲜明的运动上衣

trans.tranOther: a conventional description or depiction of heraldic arms
